title: Delicious sloppy joes
ingredients: ['680g beef mince', '1/2 onion', '1 green pepper, diced', '2 cloves of garlic, chopped', '450ml water', '180g tomato ketchup', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground rock salt', '1/2 teaspoons ground black pepper', 'cayenne pepper to taste', 'burger buns to serve']
